aboutKite.title: What is Kitesurfing?
aboutKite.subtitle: Discover the sport that combines wind, water and adrenaline
aboutKite.whatIsP1: Kitesurfing (or kiteboarding) is a wind-powered water sport that uses a traction kite connected to the rider via a harness. With the power of the wind, the rider glides across the water on a board, reaching incredible speeds and performing spectacular jumps.
aboutKite.whatIsP2: It's one of the fastest-growing water sports in the world. It combines elements of surfing, wakeboarding, paragliding and windsurfing into a unique and unforgettable experience.
aboutKite.faq1Q: Do I need to know how to swim?
aboutKite.faq1A: Yes, you need to be a confident swimmer. You don't need to be an Olympic swimmer, but you should feel comfortable in the water.
aboutKite.faq2Q: How long does it take to learn kitesurfing?
aboutKite.faq2A: With 6-12 hours of lessons (3-4 days), most students achieve their first waterstart. For independent riding, we recommend at least 20 hours of practice.
aboutKite.faq3A: Like any extreme sport, it has risks. But with professional instruction and respect for weather conditions, it's a safe sport. Our IKO-certified instructors prioritize your safety.
aboutKite.faq4A: For lessons, we provide everything: kite, board, harness, helmet and life vest. You just need sunscreen, sunglasses with a strap, and comfortable clothing.
aboutKite.faq5Q: What is the best season for kitesurfing in Salinas del Rey?
aboutKite.faq5A: The main season runs from December to April, with consistent 15-25 knot winds. However, there are also good conditions from June to August.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.metaDescription: Terms and conditions of VERONIKITES Kite School. Booking, cancellation, and liability conditions.
terms.section1Content: VERONIKITES Kite School offers kitesurfing classes for all levels in Salinas del Rey, Bolívar, Colombia. Our services include Discovery, Kite Control, and Waterstart courses, taught by instructors certified by the International Kiteboarding Organization (IKO). All necessary equipment is included in every class.
terms.section2Intro: To participate in our classes, students must:
terms.section2Item1: Be at least 12 years old (minors must have legal guardian authorization)
terms.section2Item2: Be a confident swimmer in open water
terms.section2Item3: Have no medical conditions that prevent participation in water sports
terms.section3Content: Bookings are made through our online form or via WhatsApp. The booking is confirmed once our team contacts you to validate availability and coordinate details. Published prices are subject to change without notice. Payment is made directly with the academy through available payment methods.
terms.section4Item1: Cancellations made more than 48 hours in advance will not incur any penalty.
terms.section4Item2: Cancellations with less than 48 hours notice may be subject to a 50% charge of the class value.
terms.section4Item3: In case of weather conditions unsuitable for practice (insufficient or excessive wind), the class will be rescheduled at no additional cost.
terms.section4Item4: The decision regarding weather conditions is at the sole discretion of VERONIKITES instructors.
terms.section5Content: Kitesurfing is a risk sport. Students agree to follow all safety instructions provided by IKO-certified instructors. Students are responsible for reporting any relevant medical conditions before the start of class. The use of safety equipment (helmet, life vest) is mandatory during all sessions.
terms.section6Content: VERONIKITES Kite School shall not be liable for injuries, damages, or losses that occur as a result of participation in classes, provided that established safety protocols have been followed. Students participate at their own risk and assume the inherent risks of the sport. Travel and adventure sports insurance is recommended.
terms.section7Content: All content on the VERONIKITES website, including text, images, logos, videos, and design, is protected by intellectual property rights. Reproduction, distribution, or use without express written authorization is prohibited.
terms.section8Content: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Republic of Colombia. Any disputes shall be resolved before the competent courts of Colombia, in accordance with Law 1480 of 2011 (Consumer Statute) and other applicable regulations.
